author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: كفروا باللّه وسلطانه أولئك غلبت عليهم النّفس و‌الهوى و‌رجعوا إلی مقرّهم في النّار فبئس مقرّ المنكرين...
translation: They that have disbelieved in God and rebelled against His sovereignty are the helpless victims of their corrupt inclinations and desires. These shall return to their abode in the fire of hell: wretched is the abode of the deniers!
